MS MCQs

    Deploy meetings using Teams

    »

    1. When Automatically admit people is turned on and no other settings are configured, what happens when a dial-in user tries to join the meeting?

      They wait in the lobby.

      They’re automatically rejected.

      They’re automatically admitted.


    2. How does Teams support e-discovery requests for compliance admins who are interested in meeting or call recordings?

      Compliance admins are sent a chat message in Teams after each recording.

      A recording completed message is available in the compliance content search functionality for Microsoft Teams.

      Compliance admins can use the recordcmplt PowerShell cmdlet to list completed recordings.


    3. What are the onboarding steps of a Microsoft Teams Rooms deployment?

      Room inventory and plan capabilities, device selection, procurement.

      Adoption, maintenance, and operations.

      Site readiness, service readiness, configuration, and deployment.


    4. When should you deploy Cloud Video Interop?

      As an intermediate service while you transition to a full native Microsoft Teams solution.

      As an upgrade to a full native Microsoft Teams solution.

      As an add-on to a full native Microsoft Teams Solution.
